name: Cambrian's Primordial Soup
description:
Cambrian's Primordial Soup can feed a family of 4, and a million families of trilobites in this enclosed arena, where food chains and survival of the fittest mean business, AND THAT'S NOT JUST FOOD FOR THOUGHT.

You play a trilobite who must survive this harsh ecosystem of other trilobites, eating your competition and surviving as long as possible. The further down the can you go, the more rewarding yet treacherous your fight for survival becomes. Be careful not to stray too far down if you value your primordial life...

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
Space: Dash
Z/X: Change layers

Made for RomGameJam2016
